owltools.sim2.preprocessor

Interface SimPreProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOBOSimPreProcessor, AbstractSimPreProcessor, AutomaticSimPreProcessor, BruteForceSimPreProcessor, ExpressionSimPreProcessor, GOSimPreProcessor, LCSEnabledSimPreProcessor, NullSimPreProcessor, PhenoSimHQEPreProcessor, PropertyViewSimPreProcessor

    public interface SimPreProcessor
    An ontology pre-processor will take an input ontology, apply a series of transforms, and generate an output ontology The output ontology may in many cases be the same as the input ontology
    Author:
    cjm

    • Method Detail

      • preprocess

        void preprocess()
        Generate output ontology

      • getViewClasses

        Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass> getViewClasses(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass c)
        The pre-processor may generate view classes. For example, it may generate a class equivalent to "P some C" for every input class C and some property P. This method returns all the view classes generated for any given input ontology class
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
        classes

      • getInputOntology

        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology getInputOntology()
        Returns:
        input ontology

      • setInputOntology

        void setInputOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology inputOntology)
        sets the input ontology. Should be done prior to pre-processing
        Parameters:
        inputOntology -

      • getOutputOntology

        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology getOutputOntology()
        Returns:
        output ontology

      • setOutputOntology

        void setOutputOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology outputOntology)
        sets the output ontology. Should be done prior to pre-processing. Note that this can have the same value as the input ontology. In this case all new declarations and axioms are added to the same ontology
        Parameters:
        outputOntology -

      • setReasonerFactory

        void setReasonerFactory(org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.OWLReasonerFactory reasonerFactory)
        Sets the reasoner factory. If this is called, then setReasoner() does not need to be explicitly called
        Parameters:
        reasonerFactory -

      • getReasoner

        org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.OWLReasoner getReasoner()
        Returns:
        reasoner object. Typically an Elk instance
        See Also:
        dispose()

      • setReasoner

        void setReasoner(org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.OWLReasoner reasoner)
        Sets the reasoner. The reasoner should have been instantiated with the output ontology
        Parameters:
        reasoner -
        See Also:
        dispose()

      • getLowestCommonSubsumer

        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClassExpression getLowestCommonSubsumer(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClassExpression a,
                                                                      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClassExpression b)
        Returns the LCS of a and b. If a and b have multiple named LCSs, then the LCS is the class intersection of all these
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        Returns:
        LCS
